MusicAccumulator¶

class baca.MusicAccumulator.MusicAccumulator(score_template)¶

Music-accumulator.

Special methods

__call__(music_contribution=None)¶

Calls figure-accumulator on music_contribution.

Raises exception on duplicate figure name.

>>> score_template = baca.StringTrioScoreTemplate()
>>> accumulator = baca.MusicAccumulator(score_template)
>>> accumulator(
...     accumulator.music_maker(
...         'ViolinMusicVoice',
...         [[0, 1, 2, 3]],
...         figure_name='D',
...         ),
...     )

>>> accumulator(
...     accumulator.music_maker(
...         'ViolinMusicVoice',
...         [[4, 5, 6, 7]],
...         figure_name='D',
...         ),
...     )
Traceback (most recent call last):
    ...
Exception: duplicate figure name: 'D'.

Returns none.

(AbjadObject).__format__(format_specification='')¶

Formats Abjad object.

Set format_specification to ‘’ or ‘storage’. Interprets ‘’ equal to ‘storage’.

Returns string.

(AbjadObject).__repr__()¶

Gets interpreter representation of Abjad object.

Returns string.

Methods

assemble(voice_name)¶

Assembles complete selection for voice_name.

Returns selection or none.

populate_segment_maker(segment_maker)¶

Populates segment_maker.

Returns none.

Class & static methods

static show(contribution, time_signatures)¶

Makes rhythm-maker-style LilyPond file for documentation examples.

Returns LilyPond file.

Read-only properties

music_maker¶

Gets default music-maker.

Return type:MusicMaker
score_template¶

Gets score template.

Return type:ScoreTemplate
time_signatures¶

Gets time signatures.

Return type:List[TimeSignature]
